name: Keisuke
description: First available on June 17, afterwards on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. He's in a club room of your choice on the first floor in school
ranks: Rank 5: You should tell your dad
Rank 6: Anything > Do whatever you want
Rank 7: Are you gonna be a doctor?
Rank 8: Yeah I'm fine > Anything x2
Rank 9: Try to stop him > Anything x4
unlocks: For completing this social link you are able to fuse Norn who has the unique spell Panta Rhei, and can be fused through triangle fusion using Atropos, Lachesis and Clotho.
